We also pride ourselves on the speed, efficiency and friendly support offered by our team with 24/7 support.

**VPS Features**

VPS servers are instantly setup.

Premium network - All our providers are tier 1 and we use a 1Gbps uplink to ensure fast speeds. Our network also has fail-safe redundancy.

7 day money back guarantee.

24/7 support team to assist with any issues you may have!

99.9% uptime guarantee backed by an SLA.

North America BHS Datacenter. 

Choice of Linux OS

No contracts!

rDNS/PTR records available.

Full root access and total control.

Server grade hardware - All our servers are quad-core servers that use server grade hardware and RAID technology.

SolusVM virtualization control panel.

TUN/TAP support enabled.

**General Information**

Virtualization Type and Panel: OpenVZ with SolusVM for VPS management

Payment Methods: PayPal

Refund Policy: 7 day money back guarantee on all VPS plans

**Network Tests:**

PING IP: 192.99.28.141

TOS/AUP Summary:

Content/usage of VPS must obey US law.

IRC not allowed.

Mass outbound e mailing not allowed 

TOR not allowed, but other VPNs welcome.

Full TOS: [Here](https://theskyspace.com/terms-of-service)

Full AUP: [Here](https://theskyspace.com/acceptable-use-policy)
